
---
title: '618 首轮预热：京东 PLUS 领 1150 元超级补贴，可叠万券'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - IT 之家
 - 分类资讯
headimg: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/5/fa343c6e-9acd-4f87-b478-c835867250ca.png'
author: IT 之家
comments: false
date: Mon, 23 May 2022 12:10:35 GMT
thumbnail: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/5/fa343c6e-9acd-4f87-b478-c835867250ca.png'
---

<div>   
<p data-vmark="61e4">京东 PLUS 超级补贴 618 专列终于来了，第一轮一共有五张优惠券，券额分别是满 6000 减 600、满 3000 减 300、满 2000 减 150、满 1000 减 70、满 400 减 30，依然是“可叠万券”，可用券范围稍有不同，不过数码产品覆盖很多，<a href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-uwpurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&p=JF8BAOsJK1olXDYDZBoCUBVIMzZNXhpXVhgcFR0DXR9QHDMXQA4KD1heSgINVRYJUz1NQxxBQwUHIxomSwJDQ2x8QgRRAgFJBhVaTTdNBDVQfBILBVlXABdCUQ5LXl99QDtXKmJXCjw_VBRpShdbZSZlVGJyWFJtDUoeC2YNGloRbQUAU1xbDE4UBF9rfDVLGAFsFQBZDXsXBl9DdVolXQUFUFxcDU0RB18IHF8XXwcEUFpUCE0XM28AHGtJH1RDFm5tOEgnM18JK1glA2gDB1lYAEoeUAFVGQNLAURQHzBfAUIfA2gNGmsXXAcAVm5t" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=%2fpages%2funion%2fproxy%2fproxy%3fspreadUrl%3dhttps%253a%252f%252funion-click.jd.com%252fjdc%253fe%253d%2526p%%26EA_PTAG%3d17078.27.380">点此领取</a>。</p><p data-vmark="de6a">・京东 618 预售主会场：<a href="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" target="_blank" data-wapurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-iosurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-androidurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-uwpurl="https://union-click.jd.com/jdc?e=&" data-wxmpurl="ithome://openmp?appid=wx91d27dbf599dff74&path=%2fpages%2funion%2fproxy%2fproxy%3fspreadUrl%3dhttps%253a%252f%252funion-click.jd.com%252fjdc%253fe%253d%2526p%%26EA_PTAG%3d17078.27.380">点此前往</a>。</p><p data-vmark="b340" style="text-align: start;"><strong>活动时间</strong></p><p data-vmark="f040" style="text-align: start;">领取时间：5 月 23 日 - 6 月 18 日（不定时发放多轮）</p><p data-vmark="c031" style="text-align: start;">使用时间：5 月 31 日 20 点 - 6 月 3 日（第一轮）</p><p data-vmark="3824" style="text-align: center;"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2022/5/fa343c6e-9acd-4f87-b478-c835867250ca.png" w="375" h="368" title="618 首轮预热：京东 PLUS 领 1150 元超级补贴，可叠万券" width="375" height="368" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="a65e">“全品券”可与头号京贴、店铺东券、满减活动、京享红包叠加，<span class="accentTextColor">按照平行优惠规则使用。</span></p><p data-vmark="7cf1">“PLUS 会员超级补贴券”可与头号京贴、全品类东券、限品类东券、店铺东券、满减活动、京享红包叠加，<span class="accentTextColor">按照平行优惠规则使用。</span></p><p class="tagging2">本文用于传递优惠信息，节省甄选时间，结果仅供参考。</p><div class="tagging1">【广告】</div>
